name: The Simple Apocalypse
description:
The Simple ApocalypseIs a small, simple and fun, third person & first person multiplayer shooter game, with a post-apocalyptic setting.

Compete with or against your friends in a variety of game modes such as:
  • COOP Mode
    You and your friends must eliminate all threats in the level to complete the mission.

  • Deathmatch Mode
    Simply, deathmatch, it doesn't really require an explanation.

  • Protect Civilians Mode
    Protect a bunch of confused Civilians from the hordes of Zombies until the timer ends.

  • Zombie Brawl Mode
    The first player to reach the set kill amount of Zombies, wins.
The ArsenalThe Simple Apocalypse has a wide variety of weaponry to use, such as:

  • Automatic Rifles
  • Shotguns
  • Rocket Launchers
  • And more!
VehiclesThere is also several drivable vehicles at your disposal:

  • Armored Tanks
  • Armored Trucks
  • Armored Cars
  • Civilian Vehicles
But thats not all!Other features included are:

  • Enterable buildings, you can climb on top of Rooftops or Guard towers to take cover from enemies
  • Advanced Bullet Projectiles with Ricochet and bullet penetration
  • Artificial Intelligence will react to your actions
